{{also|fälsch}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|vals}} (rarer {{m|gmh|valsch}}), borrowed from {{der|de|fro|fals}}, from {{der|de|la|falsus}}. The form with final ''-sch'' goes back to {{der|de|dum|valsch}}, itself a variant of {{m|dum|vals}}, formed by analogy (or hypercorrection) when word-final ''-s'' and ''-sch'' had become homophonous in many dialects of Middle Dutch. This form has prevailed in German because it is in line with the (significantly older) verb {{m|de|fälschen}}, whose ''-sch-'' is original. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/falʃ/|[fälʃ]|[fältʃ]}} * {{audio|de|De-falsch.ogg|audio}} ===Adjective=== {{de-adj|falscher|falschesten}} # [[false]], [[unfactual]], [[untrue]] #: {{ux|de|eine '''falsche''' Beschuldigung|a '''false''' accusation}} # [[wrong]] {{gloss|incorrect}} #: {{ux|de|eine '''falsche''' Antwort|a '''wrong''' answer}} # [[wrong]] {{gloss|disadvantageous}} #: {{ux|de|eine '''falsche''' Entscheidung|a '''wrong''' decision}} # {{lb|de|chiefly|predicative}} [[wrong]] {{gloss|immoral}} #: {{ux|de|Es ist '''falsch''', sowas zu tun.|It is '''wrong''' to do such a thing.}} # [[fake]], [[forged]] #: {{ux|de|ein '''falscher''' Geldschein|a '''counterfeit''' banknote}} #: {{ux|de|eine '''falsche''' Blondine|a '''fake''' blonde}} # [[untruthful]], [[perfidious]] #: {{ux|de|sein '''falsches''' Getue|his '''perfidious''' ways}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj|falsch|falscher|falschest}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|untrue}} {{l|de|unwahr}} * {{sense|incorrect}} {{l|de|verkehrt}}; {{l|de|inkorrekt}} * {{sense|disadvantageous}} {{l|de|verkehrt}}; {{l|de|ungünstig}} * {{sense|fake}} {{l|de|unecht}}; {{l|de|gefälscht}} ====Antonyms==== * {{sense|untrue}} {{l|de|wahr}}; {{l|de|wahrhaftig}} * {{sense|incorrect}} {{l|de|richtig}}; {{l|de|korrekt}} * {{sense|disadvantageous}} {{l|de|richtig}}; {{l|de|günstig}} * {{sense|fake}} {{l|de|echt}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Falsch}} * {{l|de|Falschgeld}} * {{l|de|Falschheit}} ====Descendants==== * {{desc|bor=1|cs|faleš}} * {{desc|bor=1|ro|falș}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|fälschen}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Adjective=== {{lb-adj}} # [[false]], [[untrue]] # [[wrong]] ====Declension==== {{lb-decl-adj}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|lb|wouer}}
